title: Hog family 'supreme'
creator_credit: Larry Gosnell, Lawrence Cherry, Evelyn Cherry and ONF | NFB
brief_description: More than fifty percent of Prince Edward Island’s hog production is classified Grade A. From a plan for live-hog grading we see how further standards were devised, culminating in the superior quality that makes Island breeding stock popular around the world.
creator_credit_for_label: Larry Gosnell, Lawrence Cherry, Evelyn Cherry and ONF | NFB
